name: War and Throne: Mobile Raid
description:
"War and Throne" is a multiplayer card war-game focused on card training. Obtain cards by drawing cards and clearing levels, constantly challenging new levels and competing with other opponents for resources, upgrading existing cards and unlocking new cards.


Here, cards are your army and skills are your weapons. Use them to create legends! Of course, a thoughtful strategy is also very important. Choose carefully according to your card abilities, combine the bonds between cards in your deck, and open your epic battlefield!



[Game Features]:

----Lords Construction
Build territories, train troops, and expand kingdoms!

----The Legion Fetters! Bloody fight
Different legion card combinations can be matched with you, this kind of battle is cool enough!

----Various ways to play, take you to experience the Gaia world
Arena competitions, dungeons, world conquests, secret trials, endless levels... a variety of gameplay, to meet your expectations!

-----Pre-battle formation, card battle
Cards are mainly divided into five camps: assault, magic, attack, defense, and archer. They have distinct characteristics, but they have fatal weaknesses. As long as the intelligence reconnaissance is in place, the strategic layout is clear, and the artifacts and skills complement each other to achieve victory by weakness.

--- Card group configuration
All cards have their own unique skills and attack methods. Use your strategy to configure and bring you a completely different combat experience.

---Combat Skills-Artifact
The collection and upgrade of artifacts. The Heart of the Earth, the Tome of Light, the Hammer of Thunder... the legendary artifact is here! Collect them to make the battle easier.

----Automatic combat system
Turn on automatic battle and battle rush, free your hands and relax in the game.

-----compete with whole server, fight with blood
Join the guild! Killing BOSS and getting benefits depend on partners!
Our ultimate goal is to become the strongest guild, sweep the army, and dominate the entire server!

----Many benefits
There are surprises for daily login, and SSR cards will be given in 7 days!


Guild red envelopes, massive diamonds for free!
